verbs.description: [ARG0: A Media Research Center study of every broadcast evening news story about the Trump administration in 2017] [V: found] [ARG1: the new President was by far the biggest story of the year , accounting for one out of every three minutes of evening news airtime] ; the tone of coverage was incessantly hostile : 90 % negative , vs. just 10 % positive ; and more than two - fifths of evening news coverage of the President ( 43 % ) focused on controversies , not policies , with the Russia investigation alone accounting for one - fifth of all Trump coverage ( 1,234 minutes ) .
